children.structure_process: 1. Disruption of Chronology → 2. Fragmented Events → 3. Multiple Perspectives → 4. Flashbacks and Flashforwards → 5. Juxtaposition of Timelines → 6. Temporal Loop or Cycle → 7. Resolution or Thematic Closure

children.terminology: 1. Disruption of Chronology → Breaking linear time order to create narrative tension or mystery
2. Fragmented Events → Story told in pieces that the audience assembles mentally
3. Multiple Perspectives → Different viewpoints revealing contrasting information
4. Flashbacks and Flashforwards → Non-chronological insertions revealing past or future
5. Juxtaposition of Timelines → Parallel timelines shown together for contrast or emphasis
6. Temporal Loop or Cycle → Repetition of events or time frames
7. Resolution or Thematic Closure → Final understanding beyond linear time
